description: BirdEye API - Real-time DeFi data, token prices, wallet analytics, and market data across Solana and EVM chains
rules: Always use the checksum contract address on supported chains
Solana and EVM chains have different response schemas
Include the x-chain header or query parameter to specify the blockchain
Cache or throttle requests to avoid hitting rate limits
Response may be null or missing data if the token is unknown or unsupported
Use the public-api.birdeye.so base URL for all API requests
API key authentication is required for most endpoints
